thread.title: Algeria: Cereal Production Hits 40 Million Quintals in 2015
thread.title_full: Algeria: Cereal Production Hits 40 Million Quintals in 2015

title: Algeria: Cereal Production Hits 40 Million Quintals in 2015
text:
Public authorities seek to progressively increase cereal production up to 70 million quintals by 2019, especially through the expansion of irrigated areas, the use of fertilizers and high quality seeds, and mechanization. Algeria 
Algerian authorities should release or try within a reasonable time in a fair and open trial a pro-Amazigh activist, … see more » Copyright © 2015 Algerie Presse Service. All rights reserved.
